title: Thagaraaru (2013)
overview: The hero and three of his friends devise a plan to get rich quick by looting a bureau. While in the process of implementing this plan they come across a lovely young woman. The hero falls in love with her and their romance spirals into a chaotic and hilarious sequence of events!
storyline: The protagonist and his 3 friends are a gang of notorious robbers who make merry in Madurai. Their way of life earns them a handful of formidable rivals. An intense depiction of friendship and love marred by rivalry and vengeance ensues.
